author: bodewig
msg: fix part of Cactus problems with the refactored JUnit task of 1.7.0: create the "delegate" as needed instead of in execute()

author: mcculls
msg: FELIX-491: save bundles with non-null classifier to different location

author: aco
msg: - Check for 0 length buffer when receiving byte messages
- Don't send an empty byte message if there is no data to flush

author: dblevins
msg: Fixed validation reporting to throw a completely correct exception at the end.  Previous code only threw a partial exception if at all.
Added better ability to set the validation output level and a clean log message that says how.
